title: Amazing fully updated 2beds available now!!!
posting_body: Updated 2 bed/1 bath with amazing city views!
Split-bedroom floor plan allows for plenty of flexible living space and privacy, with a balcony that overlooks the City.
Modern kitchen w/ granite counters and stainless steel appliances.
Two spacious full bathrooms, including one en-suite.
Primary bedroom features a large fully-organized closet.
Engineered hardwood floors in the living room; fresh neutral paint everywhere.
Cable, heat, cooking gas, AC, water all included in rent!
Popular full-amenity building offers a fitness center, outdoor pool and jacuzzi w/ sun deck and grills, 24-hour door staff.
Quick to 90/94 and 290, steps to the East Bank Club and just a short walk to all the restaurants and night life that Old Town has to offer!
